generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a central dividing line, where vehicles are driving.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, with people walking and outdoor seating areas.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial establishments with signs.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalks and in the middle of the street, providing shade.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible crossing the street and walking along the sidewalks.
- car: A silver Mercedes-Benz sedan is prominently visible in the center of the image, and other cars are parked or driving in the background.
- pole: Traffic light poles and streetlight poles are visible along the street.
- traffic light: Red traffic lights are visible at the intersections.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are mounted on poles along the street.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
